name: airline_booking_agent
description: Airline booking agent that can search for flights and make reservations. Provides comprehensive flight search, booking, and cancellation services for domestic and international travel.

skills.name: Flight Search
skills.description: Search for available flights between cities with flexible date and passenger options

skills.name: Flight Booking
skills.description: Book flights for single or multiple passengers with instant confirmation

skills.name: Booking Cancellation
skills.description: Cancel existing flight bookings with refund processing
